attributes.action: Admit that treaty change is your pie in the sky dream and call an in/out EU referendum IMMEDIATELY.
attributes.additional_details: Just how many senior EU parasites will it take to convince you that you will NEVER achieve sufficient change to the EU to satisfy the wishes of the vast majority of the british people, who want nothing to do with the EU and want OUT now. You really ought to start realising that this is one of the areas of our british way of life you are DREADFULLY wrong about, and calling an immediate IN/OUT referendum on our membership of the EU is the ONLY thing that might, only might, drag you back from the precipice of political death.
